subject: Design
title: Islamic Geometric Patterns: Math as Beauty
description: A 60-second lesson on Islamic Geometric Patterns: Math as Beauty.

hook.text: Islamic artists couldn't depict living figures. So they turned math into breathtaking art.

buildup.text: Using only a compass and straightedge, they created patterns with perfect symmetry.

discovery.text: Some 15th-century Islamic tilings are mathematically identical to Penrose patterns found in 1974.

twist.text: These artisans discovered quasi-crystalline geometry 500 years before Western mathematicians.
